title: The Weeklong Triumph of Xavier Morris
summary: Xavier Morris, a 73-year-old with hobbies in counseling and trading, discovers his newfound powers and becomes a superhero, tackling obstacles and rendering aid throughout the city over a week.
summaryGerman: Xavier Morris, ein 73-jähriger Hobbyberater und Händler, entdeckt seine neuen Kräfte und wird zum Superhelden, der innerhalb einer Woche Hindernisse überwindet und der Stadt hilft.
summaryDutch: Xavier Morris, een 73-jarige met hobbies in counseling en handel, ontdekt zijn nieuwe krachten en wordt een superheld die gedurende een week obstakels overwint en hulp biedt in de stad.
summaryFrench: Xavier Morris, un conseiller et commerçant de 73 ans, découvre ses nouveaux pouvoirs et devient un super-héros, surmontant les obstacles et apportant son aide à travers la ville pendant une semaine.

story.text: Xavier stumbles upon a glowing meteorite in his garden, which grants him extraordinary powers of persuasion and strength.
He starts his morning by halting a bank robbery, calmly talking the thieves into surrendering to the police.
Taking a break, Xavier aids troubled youths with his counseling skills, helping them see a brighter future.
He rescues workers trapped in a burning building using his newfound strength, amidst the cheers of the crowd.
At a local market, Xavier uses his trading acumen to help vendors protect themselves from unfair practices.
He spends his day giving back to the community by building homes for the homeless, lifting heavy materials with ease.
The city honors Xavier with a parade; he feels a great sense of accomplishment and hope.

ending: As the sun sets on the week, Xavier Morris looks forward to his calm, heroic life, promising to protect and serve whenever needed.
moral: Age is but a number, and it's never too late to make a significant positive impact in the world.
